name: "Magnum P.I." Season Five DVD Quiz | Magnum P.I. | 10 Questions

questions.text: What vegetable did everyone tell Magnum he smelled like after he put on Pachismo cologne in "The Legend of Garwood Huddle"?
questions.explanation:
Brussel sprouts.

	When everyone told Magnum that he smelled like brussel sprouts after he put on the Pachismo cologne, he informed them that the cologne brought out the wearer's natural scent.

questions.text: In "Kiss of the Sabre", what was the name of the author that took over Magnum's guest house and Ferrari?
questions.explanation:
Betty Wyndham.

	Betty Wyndham was an author Robin Masters took under his wing while she was trying to write her newest novel. She used Magnum's case as a basis for her novel and fantasized the case with Magnum and his friends as the characters in her book.

questions.text: What was the password Robin Masters gave Magnum in order for Magnum to get into the bank computer in "Luther Gillis: File #001"?
questions.explanation:
Rosebud.

	Magnum worked as a loan officer to find out who was embezzling funds from a bank. Since Magnum needed to spend more time on Robin's case, he had Luther Gillis come to Hawaii to take Higgins' case.

questions.text: Finish the "Magnum P.I." episode title: "Tran Quoc _____".
questions.explanation:
Jones.

	Tran Quoc Jones was a young Vietnamese boy who lived on the streets. He unintentionally got involved in one of Magnum's cases when he saw Magnum's client killed.

questions.text: Why was Higgins firing a cannon at Magnum, Rick and TC in "All For One"?
questions.correct: He was recreating a battle scene
options: The guys drank all the wine in his wine cellar.
Higgins had bumped his head and thought he was back in the war.
He was showing Agatha the cannon and it accidentally went off next to the guys.
questions.explanation:
He was recreating a battle scene.

	When the show began, Higgins was firing a cannon at the guys because they were helping him recreate the battle of Salamanka. Magnum messed up the recreation when he incorrectly went after Higgins.

questions.text: Finish the "Magnum P.I." episode title: "A Pretty Good Dancing _______".
questions.explanation:
Chicken.

	Magnum went undercover in a prison to find out information on Carol's cousin, Becky, who had disappeared. During the show, Magnum found out from her boss that she danced and sang dressed up as a chicken.

questions.text: What did Rick name the boat he was conned into buying in the episode "The Love-For-Sale Boat"?
questions.explanation:
Wright Stuff.

	"Mac" conned Rick into buying the boat that he was trying to get rid of so he wouldn't get into trouble with the guys he originally stole it from.

questions.text: Did Magnum see his friend Mac in the episode, "Mac's Back"?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	At the end of "Mac's Back", Magnum was out on the beach when Mac appeared beside him and lit his cigar. The only way Magnum knew it was Mac was the mustache worn by the fake Mac was gone.

questions.text: What was the first trip Magnum won after he submitted a new slogan to a frozen pizza company in "Professor Jonathan Higgins"?
questions.explanation:
Disney World.

	The first trip Magnum won for second place in a slogan contest was Disney World. At the end of the episode, Magnum was awarded first place after it was revealed the real first place slogan was a fraud. Because he won first place, Magnum was awarded an all expense paid trip to Waikiki.

questions.text: What song did Magnum sing in a karaoke bar in order to get information about a case he was working in the episode "The Man from Marseilles"?
questions.explanation:
Misty.

	Magnum went to a karaoke bar so he could speak to "the pearl". Gunfire coming from the men's bathroom stopped him from finishing his song. In the first few seconds of the ending credits, the scene with Magnum singing "Misty" was shown while the credits played over it. After the scene, the regular ending credit music played to finish out the credits.
